sentences.sContent: She strongly suspected he was lying to her.
sentences.sCn: 她非常怀疑他在对她撒谎。

sentences.sContent: She’s not going to be very happy about this, I suspect .
sentences.sCn: 我想对于此事她不会太高兴。

sentences.sContent: ...The next step is for the suspect to go before a judge...
...Then the police take the suspect to the police station...
...The police must give the suspect the reasons why they arc arresting him and tell him his rights under the law...
...I suspect the reason is a deep-rooted love of fire...
...The suspect returns to court a week or two later...
...I suspect that whatever Facebook has done so far to invade our privacy...
...I suspect that it’s only certain sectors of the population doing the running to the school –better –educated parents are probably more likely to be too involved...

remMethod.val: sus(在…下面) ＋ (s)pect(看) → 在下面偷偷地看 → 对…表示怀疑

words.tran: 暂停的；悬而不决的；可疑的；暧昧的
怀疑（suspect的过去分词和过去式）

trans.tranOther: to think that something is probably true, especially something bad
to think that something is probably true, especially something bad
